attributes.action: Reinstate the vote for UK nationals living in the EU for more than 5 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK nationals living in the UK are no longer allowed to vote in UK national elections. We are the only EU nationals that are disenfranchised. However the Inland Revenue still retains the right to tax UK citizens abroad with a UK income. Ammend the absent voter laws to allow nationals resident in the EU to still exercise their right to vote.
